headline.main: Births in Italy Hit Record Low in 2016, Population Ages
headline.print_headline: Births in Italy Hit Record Low in 2016, Population Ages

lead_paragraph: The number of babies born in Italy hit a record low in 2016, the population shrank and the average age crept higher, national statistics office ISTAT said on Monday.
snippet: The number of babies born in Italy hit a record low in 2016, the population shrank and the average age crept higher, national statistics office ISTAT said on Monday....
